description:
In this ninth course of the "World Religions" series, we will examine the history of the Jehovah's Witnesses. We will discuss who the founder was, when they were first founded, and the important events in their timeline. We will examine each of these in depth and begin to build a foundation that will help you be able to determine whether the teachings of this religion are trustworthy. Some of the questions we will examine include:

  • Was the founder trustworthy?
  • Was he a good moral example?
  • Was he consistent in his teaching?

Answering these questions for yourself is critical in being able to determine whether or not a religion is most likely true.

We hope this course will inspire you to continue to explore world religions and ignite a passion to search for the truth.
title: 209  -  History of the Jehovah's Witnesses
